item.title: 508 Voting 24 Hour Delay
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Im 65% Complete with this code.
I saw a tutorial how to make url load with certain symbols and it opens the personâ€™s default internet browser to the link.

Instead of MySQL, Im going to use java simple date format.
Copy of the code im going to use:

    public static void getvoteDate() {
        DateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss");
        Date date = new Date();
        String currentDate = dateFormat.format(date);
        date = null;
        dateFormat = null;
        return currentDate;
    }

Im trying to make it so that the hour from when he used the command, It adds +24 hours so 1 day later he can vote again.
Some1 help? Thank Mopar =D
